Next Week's Film To Watch: Blow Out

Share This Episode:

009: Jelly Donut

Nov 21, 2015


Strap your boots up because this week we’re going to ‘Nam with Full Metal Jacket! We talk about the two halves of the movie, the legacy of Stanley Kubrick, how it stacks up to other Vietnam movies and our experience with films depicting wars we have lived through. We also announce our new sponsor, Audible.com! Click here to get a free audiobook and support the show!

Your Screen Is Not Dead
